caption:
“Be still, and know that I am God.” — Psalm 46:10

Reflection:
In the hush of dawn, the soul breathes again. Stillness strips away illusion until only truth remains. When the world falls silent, the Eternal is heard most clearly.

Commentary:
This verse calls us to stop striving and rest in divine presence. Faith is not achieved through effort but through surrender — by allowing quiet to become prayer.
